bug.author: Sohojoe
bug.summary: conflicting info on number of seeds for round2
bug.description:
here it says there are 10,000 seeds - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/obstacle-tower-env/blob/master/reset-parameters.md>https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/obstacle-tower-env/blob/master/reset-parameters.md</denchmark-link>
here is says there are 100 seeds -
obstacle-tower-env/obstacle_tower_env.py
Line 276 in f121d5a
if seed < 0 or seed >= 100:
Which is right? Thanks!

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Sohojoe>@Sohojoe</denchmark-link>
Thanks for pointing this out. The seeds for Round 2 are limited to 100. After the competition we will enable support for 10,000 seeds. That is what the documentation refers to. This is obviously misleading, and I will change it.
